scenario_text.value: How ya doin’, Miyuki?

Is, is that a “good”? Or a “not so good”?
I can’t tell!
Miyuki seems to be upset about something.

You don’t need to worry about the two of us.
We’re used to this sort of thing.
Used to...?

When the two of us are together, nothing can
faze us.

Don’t be like that. There’s no telling when
enemies will show up here.

The girls will sleep here, and they’ll
protect you two, like we decided before.
Sure. Aoi, Saki and Miu came, so it’s fine.

It’s a little noisy, with all these people
around...

Noisy, he says... Are you guys not getting
along or something?
Hmm... Same as usual, I guess.

Uh, okay... Is there anything about the setup
you don’t like, or that bothers you?

Not really... Everyone helps Miyuki bathe and
change clothes, so it’s a big help.
Change clothes?!

Right, right... Girls do that sorta thing
together...
(Oh! Wait, does that mean...?)

So do you guys, like...all change here?
Together?
Huh? Yeah, so?
So?!
(Haru changes with the girls?!)
That’s not cool!
I’m jealous, Haru!
Best not think about it.
That’s not cool!
What’s not?

You may be a kid, but you’re still a boy,
Haru!
Yeah? And?
I mean, it’s just...
(How do I even explain this?!)

(You can’t watch girls changing, but how do
I say that to a kid as clueless as this?)
(Oh... Maybe he’s so clueless, it’s okay?)

Ahaha, your expression’s all over the place
Takuma!

If I shouldn’t change with the girls, does
that mean I should I change with you guys?
I’d have to bring Miyuki with me, of course.
Ah... That’d be even worse, so...
I’m jealous, Haru!
Of what?

I mean, I can’t really say while Miyuki’s in
earshot...

At any rate, you’ve achieved every young
boy’s dream!
...What do you mean?
I mean, I can’t really go into detail, but...

You’ve got the gentle, pretty Aoi, and the
cheerful, cute Saki, see.
And you, you know, get to...you know!
Honestly, I’m super um, interested in that!
I...have no clue what you’re talking about.

(Yeah, makes sense. I couldn’t explain what
I’m trying to say, either.)

(Miyuki’s gaze has gone kinda cold. That’s
gotta be my fault...)

(Ah, well... Best not think about it too
deeply.)

(He’s just a little boy in the first place,
I doubt he’ll get any pervy thoughts.)
(Yeah, pervy thoughts. Y’know, like⁠—)
Ah, no! Cold shower, cold shower!
What?

Uh... Sorry, no big deal. Maybe I’m getting
a bit ripe here, eh heh...

(Yeah, I’ll just drop it. It’ll just be that
much harder to face the girls otherwise...)

Well, uh, if everything’s good then I’ll
leave it at that.

I’m sure the problems will keep on coming,
though...
Huh? You say something?
No, nothing.

Miyuki and I are just fine. We’ll handle
things on our own, just like we always have.

So like I said, don’t worry about us.
...We’re different from the rest of you.
Different, you say?

It looks like my sister is sleepy, so I have
to put her to bed. Bye, Takuma.
Oh, uh. Sure. Later.

(Different... I wonder how?
What separates them from us?)
Don’t worry about the two of us.
